front.title: Requirements to Extend the Datatracker for WG Chairs and Authors

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for new functionality to be added to the IETF Datatracker tool to make it possible for Working Group (WG) Chairs and their delegates to input and update the status of WG documents. After the functionality is implemented, WG Chairs, WG document authors and all other IETF participants will have access to more information about the WG status history, current state, and progression of IETF WG documents from their earliest stages.
